{{< chooser language "typescript,python,go,csharp" / >}}

{{% example csharp %}}
```csharp
using Pulumi;
using AliCloud = Pulumi.AliCloud;

class MyStack : Stack
{
    public MyStack()
    {
        var example = Output.Create(AliCloud.Cen.GetRouteServices.InvokeAsync(new AliCloud.Cen.GetRouteServicesArgs
        {
            CenId = "cen-7qthudw0ll6jmc****",
        }));
        this.FirstCenRouteServiceId = example.Apply(example => example.Services[0].Id);
    }

    [Output("firstCenRouteServiceId")]
    public Output<string> FirstCenRouteServiceId { get; set; }
}
```

{{% /example %}}

{{% example go %}}
```go
package main

import (
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/sdk/v2/go/alicloud/cen"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v2/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		example, err := cen.GetRouteServices(ctx, &cen.GetRouteServicesArgs{
			CenId: "cen-7qthudw0ll6jmc****",
		}, nil)
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		ctx.Export("firstCenRouteServiceId", example.Services[0].Id)
		return nil
	})
}
```

        <span id="cen_id_python">
<a href="#cen_id_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">cen_<wbr>id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}-(Required, ForceNew) The ID of the CEN instance.
{{% /md %}}</dd>
    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="cidrs_python">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Sequence[str]</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The IP address of the cloud service.
{{% /md %}}</dd>
    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="description_python">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The description of the cloud service.
{{% /md %}}</dd>
    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="host_python">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}-(Optional, ForceNew) The domain name or IP address of the cloud service.
{{% /md %}}</dd>
    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="host_region_id_python">

    <dt class="property-required"

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The update interval. Default value: 5. The value cannot be modified.
{{% /md %}}</dd>
</dl>
{{% /choosable %}}
